name: Buk for WordPress
author: Untold Ventures

sections.description:
Online booking software for your business. With your own-branded booking page your clients can easily see if you’re available and make appointments on the fly. Access your online calendar, manage your appointments and notify your clients with unlimited automatic reminders via SMS and email. With the plugin you can add a buk.app shortcode to your WordPress site.

Getting started:

  1. Create your free account at BUK.app
  2. Add your “buk” shortcode to any page on your site.
  3. You’re done ðŸ™‚
sections.installation: • Go to any post/page and include a “buk” shortcode with a single slug parameter refering to your BUK.app account (e.g., for https://example.buk.app use [buk slug=”example”]).
sections.faq:
What is BUK for?

BUK allows your customers to book appointments anywhere at anytime by themselves, without phoning, emailing or texting you.

Is BUK only for barbershops?

Absolutely not! BUK is made for any business that need to schedule appointments. It’s used everyday by beauty salons, SPAs, personal trainers, physiotherapist, and many more professionals.

How do I install BUK?

There is nothing to install. BUK uses the latest web technologies so your customers can access it on any device (mobile phones included).

Can you help me set up BUK?

Sure. If you need help setting up BUK or have any other question, get in touch here.

Can my costumers pay with BUK?

No. BUK focuses on giving users the simplest, most streamlined booking experience possible. We send texts and email confirmations and reminders to your customers to make sure they donâ€™t miss their appointment.

Will BUK work with my Site or Facebook profile?

Sure, in order to allow bookings directly from your site you just need to use our BUK wordPress plugin. For Facebook and other social media profiles just follow our guide here.
